definition: to charter a ship/to take a vessel on rent
to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax

sentences.english: A contract of affreightment is common in charter transportation.
sentences.chinese: 包运租船合同，是租船运输中的一种常见方式。

sentences.english: A contract of affreightment is common in charter transportation.
sentences.chinese: 包运租船合同，是租船运输中的一种常见方式。

sentences.english: From the dock here you can rent watercraft and do something that very few know about it.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在这里的码头上租船并且做一些你不了解的事。

sentences.english: Chatterer must be responsible for demurrage.
sentences.chinese: 租船人必须对滞期负责。

sentences.english: Problems about last voyage usually happen under time charter party.
sentences.chinese: 最后航次问题是定期租船中一个常见的问题。

sentences.english: Should the Vessel be prevented from China trading, Charterers to have the option of cancelling the Charter.
sentences.chinese: 如本船航行中因受阻，租船人有解除本租约的选择权。

sentences.english: Chatterer must be responsible for demurrage .
sentences.chinese: 租船人必须对滞期负责。

sentences.english: The ships freight transportation acts for, charterering and booking service.
sentences.chinese: 船舶货运代理，租船订舱。

sentences.english: We prefer to have the China National Chartering Corporation take care of the shipping.
sentences.chinese: 我们想让中国租船公司负责租船装运。

sentences.english: We prefer to have the China National Chartering Corporation take care of the shipping.
sentences.chinese: 我们想让中国租船公司负责租船装运。

sentences.english: The charterers argued that there was indeed no dispute because they had admitted their liability as well as the amount of the claim.
sentences.chinese: 租船人于是起诉到高等法院要求撤销仲裁裁决。

sentences.english: Large amount of disputes occurs spontaneously between shipowner and charterer on this case.
sentences.chinese: 船东和租船人围绕这个内容产生的纠纷为数不少。

sentences.english: We will take the responsibility of chartering a ship.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以负责租船装运。

sentences.english: This paper is mostly researching the financial decision-making of these affreightment businesses.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究的是这几种租船业务的财务决策问题。

sentences.english: It is the seller that charters ships, books shipping space and pays for the cargo loading.
sentences.chinese: 卖放负责租船或订舱，并支付至目的港的运费。

sentences.english: Rachel: Remember when we went to Central Park and rented boats?… That was fun.
sentences.chinese: 还记得咱们去中央公园租船吗？那真好玩。

definition: to embark/to travel by ship/to ferry
person who lives and makes a living on a boat/boatman/boat dweller
fishing boat/same as 漁船|渔船
